Package sait.frms.manager

Class ReservationManager

java.lang.Object
sait.frms.manager.ReservationManager
public class ReservationManager
extends java.lang.Object
This is the Reservation manager that manages the data from Reservation object.
Version:
June, 25, 2021
Author:
Robyn Balanag, Liam McLaughlin

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservations

    • makeReservation

      public Reservation makeReservation​(Flight flight, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String citizenship) throws InvalidNameException, InvalidCitizenshipException, InvalidFlightCodeException, NoMoreSeatsException
      Will create a reservation object. With these parameters: String code, String flightCode, String airline, String name, String citizenship, double cost, boolean active
      Returns:
      the Reservation
      Throws:
      InvalidNameException
      InvalidCitizenshipException
      InvalidFlightCodeException
      NoMoreSeatsException

    • findReservations

      public java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> findReservations​(java.lang.String code, java.lang.String airline, java.lang.String name)
      This will find and return an araylist of reservations that contain search results that match reservations.
      Parameters:
      code - the code to use
      airline - the airline code to use
      name - the name to use
      Returns:
      the list of reservations

    • findReservationByCode

      public Reservation findReservationByCode​(java.lang.String code)
      This method will find reservation by using a code. It returns a Reservations object.
      Parameters:
      code - the code to use
      Returns:
      the reservation using the code

    • persist

      public void persist()
      This method will save Reservations to binary file(RESERVATIONS_FILEPATH) when called.

      Returns:
      the number of available seats

    • generateReservationCode

      private java.lang.String generateReservationCode​(Flight flight) throws InvalidFlightCodeException
      This method will generate a reservation code and return a string.
      Parameters:
      flight - the flight object
      Returns:
      a generated confirmation code
      Throws:
      InvalidFlightCodeException

    • populateFromBinary

      private void populateFromBinary() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      This method will bring in the reservations from binary and add it to the arrayList.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException
